name: Dice of God (itch)
description:
In Dice of God you have to protect your village with your dice. Reload your slingshot and aim enemies to kill them.

You can upgrade your dice and play with your own strategy with the help of the Blacksmith.

Create during GMTK2022 : Roll Of Dice

Credit : Remi Cham
Brieux Caquelin

Thanks to : Romain Coutellier
Vincent Callède
Ilona Duprey
Andrea Michel
